str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dialogizomai; discussion, i.e. consideration, or debate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wise, learned, cultivated, skilled, clever. Akin to saphes; wise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Vain, unreal, ineffectual, unproductive; practically: godless. From the base of maten; empty, i.e. profitless, or, an idol.
